info.title: nlp-land-backend
info.description:
Specification JSONs: [v2](/api-spec/v2), [v3](/api-spec/v3).

API server of the nlp-land project. This is the main part of storing data and accessing an external data analysis endpoint. It uses a mongoDB instance to store everything.

schema.example: A token is required for authentication
A token is required for authentication
A token is required for authentication
